summary:
Stripe - Draft Context Pack v0

Mission: Stripe builds financial infrastructure that ambitious companies use to launch their boldest products.

Target Customers:
- Startups: Hours-old startups
- Complex Global Businesses: Complex global businesses

Jobs to be Done:
- Accept and optimize payments globally, enable any billing model, monetize through agentic commerce, create a card issuing program, access borderless money movement with stablecoins and crypto, embed payments in platforms

Note: This is a draft pack (v0) based on public information. Complete the interview to create the final pack (v1) with founder insights.
